alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 12:05PM MST until January 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Total snow accumulation 6 to 12 inches. Localized amounts over a foot are occurring. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central Colorado. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The band of snow that has produced heavy snowfall rates in areas across Colorado and south of I-70 continues but is shrinking. Reports over a foot have come in.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
